questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In ten years, the life will be really different. Most if changes will probably come form the coming of a real A.I. instantiate by a better knowledge of brain. This evolution will put the world in a time of chaos. Because with those new inteligent robot, a lot of people will lost their job because a robot could do the same think as an human but faster and cheaper.
